name: jugdish
text: poor little phillipe

name: i_love_kate
text: Not to mention poor little Philippe.

name: picnick
text: Why not?

name: afrothunder
text: Not to mention the poor little turtle.

name: kazad
text: Deafness immediately causes wrap-around Picard baldness and a math teacher mustache.

name: chuchurocket
text: I believe that hairstyle is referred to as the "fornander".

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pwb, 7th_shot, Bobothebum, puguglypress)

name: chuchurocket
text: uh...what? fornander is my ex's last name, and he once sported that style.  how patrick stewart came across this information is beyond me.

name: terebikun
text: I think your ex owes Patrick Stewart an apology.

name: soticoto
text:
Everyone owes Patrick Stewart an apology on some level.
I can't even play Oblivion (TESIV) without getting hella remorse that I let Patrick Stewart's character die in the intro... and always end up committing seppuku in-game.

name: sock
text: I had never before realized that was him, Soticoto. Now I have to play it AGAIN, damnit.

name: libelandslander
text:
How could anyone ever not recognize Patrick Stewart's voice?
I mean, I recognize every member of the TNG cast instantly (Mass Effect. Marina Sirtis. Awesome.), but I assumed everyone could recognize Patrick Stewart in a similar amount of time.

name: lolsworth
text: It got him his knighthood.

name: dusty
text: Did you ever watch gargoyles? It was like they went to the closeout sale for the end of TNG and just bought up all the spare actors.

name: rockstarsatemy
text: dude, you are 24, and you dated a guy that bald?

name: chuchurocket
text: it wasn't natural hair loss.  he's my age, he shaved his hair that way.

name: rockstarsatemy
text: that is crazy.

name: overmedicated
text: crazy AWESOME

name: kaithekender
text: No, just regular type

name: numberkillinger
text: men who bald prematurely should be denied sexual lovin'?

name: overmedicated
text: Have you seen how young Patrick Stewart's girlfriend is? The dude likes love.

name: dusty
text: He's a charming guy, but with that voice alone a man could be a box with wheels and still win him some tang on the regular.

name: likeiwassaying
text: Someone lamed you because of a problem.

name: methadone
text: first mention of phillipe's father?

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
No, earlier on they say his dad died.

Phillipe looks amazing here.

name: moraiat
text:
Yup http://achewood.com/index.php?date=01292002

Might even be one before that, this was the first one that came to mind.

name: howard
text: Phillipe's expression in the first panel breaks my heart every time.

name: budenhagen
text: Totally. You would have to have a heart made of stone to not feel just a little bit sad by a hurting Philippe... especially if you're a Freezepop fan.

name: lizjones
text: A comment left by lizjones was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by patkun, featurelessvoid, chivalress)

name: soticoto
text: Lyle isn't Sodom, yo.

name: achilleselbow
text: ...boned?

name: red_dawn
text: I wonder if Phillipe's father is bald, as the little otter always imagines himself as such in the far future.

name: riazm
text: When I am having a bad day I find there's nothing better than seeing someone run over a turtle with a car.

name: spinynorman
text: I'm pretty sure me and Lyle know the same guy. Drinks nothing but bargain gin. I like him, even though he's a little racist, but you know, what can you do.

name: riazm
text:
I guess I'm a little racist
but what's a guy to do-
I like to judge people based on their ethnic background,
I'm glad I judged you.

name: achilleselbow
text: Not enough chubbies in the world for this.

name: nielj
text: Not enough chubblies in the world, period.

name: junko
text: I love how Beef spaces out in the third panel as his fantasy runs away with him.

name: molesticide
text:
how important is it that lyle knows a guy? how hard is it to drive to the pet store to get a turtle, but not allow the turtle into the car when it's time to drive out of the parking lot?

and i'm in the pool with dudes who have declared that phillipe is really well-drawn here.

name: tekende
text: That makes me sad for turtles. heh heh.

name: slalvation
text: My guess is "harder for stuffed animals than for humans."

name: connellingus
text: For Philippe, baldness requires growing more hair.

name: shoinan
text: An aged Phillipe always seems to have more hair. It's a thing.

name: spicyponyhead
text: It's like on humans, how your ears and nose don't stop growing.

name: stuart
text: I like how accurate Phillipe's subconscious/imaginary Lyle is to the real one.

name: clever-nickname
text: Phillippe's deafness keeps Lyle from aging, apparently.

name: myrrdisparo
text:
I find it strange that I'm the first one to mention this, but for some reason I feel that Beef is stoned out of his mind in panel three.
After all, he's done cocaine once!

name: jackparsons
text: Philippe makes a very cute elderly otter.

name: mysterymeat1001
text: This one reminds me of Ralphie's going-blind fantasy from A Christmas Story.

name: tekende
text: I told you not to use LifeBuoy!

name: buttermoths
text:
Whoa, MY father once knew a man too.
Freaky.

name: missbee
text:
Don't feel so special. Everyone's father has known at least one man.
And perhaps a lady.

name: wittyname
text: This was actually the first strip I read. I had no idea what the hell was going on .

name: goocifer
text: the first time i read this i thought that those grey patches were ear covers so his cochlea wouldn't eject out and break a large sheet of glass that two guys in overalls were carrying across a street.

name: slalvation
text: So did I, but then I thought, "Why would he bandage his upper lip / grow a mustache suddenly?" And realized he must be old.

name: dallovich
text: The alt text adds a whole new perspective to the strip!

name: elliotj
text: Philippe ain't five

name: swatson
text: HE IS FIVE!

name: kickstart
text: Bitchslap Pikachu DOES NOT APPROVE

name: dumase
text: A great thing: a hair had fallen on my laptop's screen on panel 3, and the way it was placed gave the motion-lined appearance that Beef's head was actually spinning around.

name: charchar
text:
Lyle's Decision-Making Flowchart: Phillipe's Head Edition

How is today? -----> Pretty sweet
| |
| \|/
|->[ SUCKS ] [ imbibe ]
|
\|/
[ Run over a turtle with a car ]

name: charchar
text: pretend the italics match each other.

name: goatmasterflash
text: I'd rather pretend the down arrows are bare ascii tang.

name: dasuta
text: My father also knew a man, Philippe.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: Beef is totally some thing else in panel three.
